hero.name: Precious Wogu
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Precious
hero.description: A trailblazing blockchain innovator, leader, and mentor with a mission to revolutionize the blockchain and DeFi landscape globally. As the founder of Blockvila Limited, I have achieved significant milestones in reshaping the African blockchain scene and beyond. Blockvila stands as a beacon of DeFi innovation, offering digital asset exchange, both decentralized and centralized wallets, crypto P2P loans, seamless crypto trading, smart contracts solutions and blockchain education. I am committed to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the ever-evolving blockchain space. Join me on this transformative journey as we shape the future of decentralized finance together.

about.title: I’M an Entreprenuer, Blockchain Expert, Mentor
about.description:
Mission

Empowering Lives Through Blockchain: My mission is to foster financial independence and empower individuals in Africa by providing comprehensive technical and blockchain skills training. Through Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives, I have successfully trained over 700 youths, women, and young girls, equipping them with vital blockchain-related skills such as shared ledgers, Hyperledger, tokenization, Web 3.0 basics, smart contracts, and cryptocurrency trading.

Vision

Leading Blockchain Education and Adoption: I envision a future where blockchain technology is accessible to all. Through seminars, scholarships, conferences, and media initiatives, I strive to create mass education, awareness, and adoption of blockchain among individuals and companies. Beyond education, my goal is to be a beacon for the best blockchain solutions, guiding end-users towards decentralized financial empowerment.

details.title: BLOCKVILA
details.description: As the Founder and CEO of Blockvila, I lead a pioneering digital finance venture providing DeFi solutions and serving as a premier digital asset exchange based in Nigeria. Established in 2017 as ngexchanger a Subsidiary of Nyxel Integrated Services and later upgraded in 2019 to Blockvila, we offer a comprehensive range of decentralized financial services, including secure digital asset exchange, both decentralized and centralized wallet solutions, peer-to-peer crypto loans, tokenization of digital assets, and smart contract services. Our commitment to innovation and excellence underscores Blockvila's role as a dynamic force in transforming the cryptocurrency landscape, providing users with cutting-edge solutions for their diverse financial needs.

details.title: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Awareness Tour (BCAT)
details.description: A collaborative initiative with key stakeholders in Africa's blockchain technology sector, I am deeply engaged in spearheading a transformative campaign. BCAT focuses on educating and mentoring African youths, empowering them to reshape their destinies through blockchain knowledge and skills. Within BCAT, I lead the women empowerment programs, leveraging my leadership to mentor numerous university students. I am dedicated to providing blockchain education across various Nigerian universities, equipping students with essential skills that pave the way for their future success. This initiative is not just about awareness but about actively equipping the younger generation with practical blockchain skills, fostering a new wave of innovation and opportunity in Africa's blockchain landscape.

upcomingProjects.title: CryptoMarkings
upcomingProjects.subTitle: CryptoMarkings - Empowering Crypto Traders with AI

details.title: CryptoMarkings - Empowering Crypto Traders with AI
details.description: As the visionary behind CryptoMarkings, derived from the name “Crypto Market Kings,“ I am currently leading a cutting-edge project aimed at revolutionizing the cryptocurrency trading landscape. CryptoMarkings is designed to empower crypto traders by automating trading strategies and technical analysis through the implementation of artificial intelligence. By harnessing the power of AI, this project seeks to streamline and enhance the efficiency of traders' decision-making processes, reducing the effort required for comprehensive trade analysis. Stay tuned for the unveiling of this innovative platform, poised to redefine the way traders engage with the dynamic world of cryptocurrency.

details.title: MediaBlast - Blockchain-Powered Social Media Mastery
details.description: In my ongoing endeavors, I am actively involved in the development of MediaBlast—an all-in-one social media management platform that seamlessly integrates blockchain technology. MediaBlast employs blockchain to timestamp and authenticate shared content, empowering users with ownership and control, thus mitigating the risk of content theft. Smart contracts are intelligently woven into the platform, facilitating transparent and automated advertising transactions between advertisers and content creators. Additionally, AI functionality is harnessed to streamline social media management, allowing users to schedule and automate postings efficiently. MediaBlast represents a forward-thinking approach, blending blockchain, smart contracts, and AI to redefine the landscape of social media management.
